stdyInfo.abstract: This is the replication data associated with our article in "Journal of Vegetation Science" titled "Grazing alters the sensitivity of plant productivity to precipitation in northern temperate grasslands". Please see the ReadMe file for details on dataset contents.

citation.biblCit: Batbaatar, A., Bork, E.W., Broadbent, T., Alexander, M.J., Cahill Jr., J.F. & Carlyle, C.N. 2021. Grazing alters the sensitivity of plant productivity to precipitation in northern temperate grasslands. Journal of Vegetation Science.
